nodes.text: Vusk was a male Kassk pirate in the Warbird gang. He had yellow skin, green eyes, and wore white armor with red markings.

Vusk was first identified by the credits of "A Quick Salvage Run," in which the character was voiced by Jason Hightower. In early drafts of "Kaz's Curse," Vusk was originally the pirate who put a curse on Kazuda Xiono, before it was changed to the Nikto Leoz.
